name: Munnar
description: Beautiful hill station known for tea plantations and cool climate
details: Munnar is a popular hill station in Kerala, famous for its tea plantations, cool climate, and scenic beauty. Located at an altitude of 1,600 meters, it offers breathtaking views of rolling hills covered with tea estates.

name: Kochi (Cochin)
description: Historic port city known for Chinese fishing nets and colonial architecture
details: Kochi is a vibrant city with a rich blend of Indian, Portuguese, Dutch, and British heritage. It's famous for its Chinese fishing nets, historic Fort Kochi, and being the gateway to Kerala's backwaters.

name: Alleppey (Alappuzha)
description: Venice of East - Famous for its backwaters and houseboat cruises
details: Alleppey is renowned for its beautiful backwaters, houseboats, and annual Nehru Trophy Boat Race. It's a perfect destination for a peaceful retreat away from city life.

name: Ooty (Ootacamund)
description: Queen of Hill Stations - Picturesque town in the Nilgiri Hills
details: Ooty is a charming hill station with beautiful gardens, lakes, and tea estates. Known as the 'Queen of Hill Stations', it offers a refreshing escape with its cool climate and stunning natural beauty.
bestTime: March to June, September to November

name: Mahabalipuram
description: Ancient port city with magnificent rock-cut temples and UNESCO World Heritage Site
details: Mahabalipuram is famous for its ancient monuments dating back to the 7th and 8th centuries. This UNESCO World Heritage Site showcases magnificent rock-cut architecture and is known for its shore temples.

name: Kodaikanal
description: Princess of Hill Stations - Beautiful hill retreat with natural beauty
details: Kodaikanal is a serene hill station known for its picturesque landscapes, lakes, and pleasant climate. Often called the 'Princess of Hill Stations', it offers breathtaking views and peaceful atmosphere.
bestTime: April to June, September to October

name: Mysore
description: City of Palaces - Royal heritage and cultural hub
details: Mysore is known for its magnificent palaces, especially the Mysore Palace, which is illuminated every Sunday. The city has a rich royal heritage and is famous for its silk, sandalwood, and Mysore Pak.

name: Coorg (Kodagu)
description: Scotland of India - Coffee plantations and misty hills
details: Coorg is famous for its coffee plantations, scenic beauty, and pleasant weather. Known as the 'Scotland of India', it offers beautiful landscapes, waterfalls, and opportunities for adventure activities.

name: Gokarna
description: Peaceful beach destination with sacred temples and pristine beaches
details: Gokarna is a small temple town with beautiful beaches, known for its spiritual significance and laid-back atmosphere. It's a perfect blend of spirituality and beach holiday.

name: Udaipur
description: City of Lakes - Romantic destination with beautiful palaces
details: Udaipur is famous for its beautiful lakes, palaces, and romantic ambiance. Known as the 'Venice of the East', it offers stunning architecture and picturesque settings for a memorable visit.
weather: Pleasant in winter, hot in summer

name: Jaisalmer
description: Golden City - Desert paradise with magnificent forts
details: Jaisalmer is a city in the heart of the Thar Desert, famous for its golden sand dunes and magnificent sandstone architecture. The Jaisalmer Fort is a living fort with residential quarters.

name: Guwahati
description: Gateway to Northeast - Major city with spiritual and natural attractions
details: Guwahati is the largest city in Assam and serves as the gateway to the Northeast. It's known for the Kamakhya Temple, which is one of the most important Shakti Peethas.

name: Agra
description: City of the Taj Mahal - Home to one of the Seven Wonders of the World
details: Agra is home to the iconic Taj Mahal, one of the Seven Wonders of the World. The city has a rich Mughal history with several UNESCO World Heritage Sites including the Agra Fort.

name: Varanasi (Kashi)
description: Spiritual Capital of India - One of the oldest living cities
details: Varanasi is one of the oldest continuously inhabited cities in the world. It's the spiritual capital of India, known for its ghats on the Ganges, religious significance, and vibrant culture.

name: Visakhapatnam
description: Jewel of the East Coast - Coastal city with beaches and industries
details: Visakhapatnam, also known as Vizag, is a port city on the east coast with beautiful beaches, hills, and natural harbors. It's one of the largest cities in Andhra Pradesh.

name: Srinagar
description: Venice of India - Beautiful lakes and Mughal gardens
details: Srinagar is famous for its beautiful Dal Lake, Mughal gardens, and houseboats. It's surrounded by snow-capped mountains and offers breathtaking natural beauty throughout the year.

name: Gulmarg
description: Meadow of Flowers - Premier ski destination in India
details: Gulmarg is India's premier ski destination and is famous for its snow-covered landscapes, gondola rides, and beautiful meadows. It's a paradise for adventure enthusiasts.
